member.name: T:Microsoft.International.ChineseTextAlignment.SmartAlignmentUnitInfoProvider
member.summary: This class provides smart alignment unit information.

remarks.p: This class implements IAlignmentUnitProvider interface and provides alignment unit information for one of the most common styles of text alignment.
IsNewAlignmentMethod returns true for the following conditions, otherwise the method returns false.

list.item: Previous character is CJK ideographic character.
Previous character is not '(' (U+0028), and current character is '('.
Previous character is ')' (U+0029), and current character is not ')'.
Previous character is alphabet character (a-z and A-Z), numeric character (0-9) or '('. /And current character is not alphabet character, numeric character or ')'.

remarks.p:
See Utility Class in WinForm or Utility Class in Wpf
for an example of using Utility.
